articles.content: Update: Sony has declined to comment on whether backdoor hacks, allowing Chinese players to access and download content not currently licensed for release in the region, have played a part in the PlayStation Store's closure in the country. According to Reuter… [+1411 chars]

articles.author: By Jennifer Newton for MailOnline Reuters
articles.title: The ultimate coronavirus-resistant restaurant, which serves one customer at a time, opens in Sweden - Daily Mail
articles.description: The restaurant in Ransäter - named Bord for En, which is Table for One in English - has no waiters and the food is delivered to the table in a basket from the kitchen window via a pulley system.
articles.content:
There's no need to worry about social distancing at this restaurant, because it only accepts one diner at a time. 
A pop-up eaterie has opened in a meadow in Sweden with just one table and one chair - and has welcomed its first guest.  
The restaurant in Ra… [+2283 chars]

articles.author: Alex Alderson
articles.title: Xiaomi presents the Redmi K30 Extreme Edition with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 768G and an eye-catching new colour variant; no MIUI 12 on launch - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: A new version of the Xiaomi Redmi K30 is here, complete with a new chipset and a fresh colour option. Priced at CNY 1,999 (~US$283), the Redmi K30 Extreme Edition features all the good aspects of the Redmi K30 5G but with the new Qualcomm Snapdragon 768G SoC.…
articles.content: Xiaomi has launched a new version of the Redmi K30, and on an entirely new chipset too. Powered by the Snapdragon 768G 5G, the Redmi K30 Extreme Edition is essentially an overclocked Redmi K30 5G. Also referred to elsewhere as the Racing or Speed Edition, the… [+1706 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo has new unannounced Switch games this year confirms president - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: New Nintendo Switch games are planned for release this year, but they may be delayed because of the coronavirus.
articles.content:
What are Nintendos secret games? (pic: Nintendo)
New Nintendo Switch games are planned for release this year, but they may be delayed because of the coronavirus.

articles.title: Apple sale: 13-inch MacBook Pro gets a HUGE $400 price cut - Creative Bloq

articles.content: The arrival of Apple's new 13-inch MacBook Pro 2020 earlier this month means we're now seeing some great deals on the 2019 version of the powerful laptop. The best we've seen so far is a deal from B&H Photo, where the 2019 13-inch MacBook Pro is on sale f… [+1929 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Amos
articles.title: Dr Disrespect lists what Warzone needs to add next - Dexerto
articles.description: While other games are biting on the Call of Duty battle royale's heels, the Doc sees promises in Warzone, and has a list of features Infinity Ward should adopt.
articles.content:
Dr Disrespect has listed a bunch of features he wants to see added to Call of Duty's Warzone ⁠— and says “now is the time” to implement them.
Warzone was once the King of Twitch. After its March 10 release, it shot to the top of the streaming charts as every… [+2566 chars]

articles.author: David Snelling
articles.title: Sonos reveals all-new Arc soundbar...and that's not all that has changed - Express
articles.description: SONOS ARC is the latest soundbar from smart speaker brand Sonos. The new device gets a fresh look and a massive audio upgrade ...and it's not the only new addition to the range. Here is everything that's new.
